description: This file defines a React component for a page that manages OAuth connection flows to JIRA and Confluence integrations, including UI rendering, OAuth initiation, and callback handling.

methods.name: ConnectPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the OAuth connection page with suspense fallback.

methods.name: ConnectInner
methods.description: Inner component managing OAuth flow state, callback processing, and UI interactions.

methods.name: startOAuth
methods.description: Function initiating OAuth flow by redirecting to backend login URL.
